name: Death Taxes
description:
Death Taxes is the outcome of a single day, group game-jam I hosted during my second year of University, the theme of which was "A punishment worse than death". 

This game jam was a lot of fun to participate in, having a table-top theme offered our group the opportunity to save time debugging or running into coding errors, the non-digital route allowed us to focus on designing a game as opposed to developing one.
